特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: Lectures, case discussions, and presentations(and/or short term paper).

第1回: Course Introduction & Basic understanding of Japanese marketing communication
第3回: Three aspects  of Japanese Marketing communication
第9回: deeper exploration & analysis of the cases dealt with in the previous classes
第10回: Eigyo, Japanese style of buidling communication with customers
トピック.授業外学習2: The student is expected to prepare for classes by completing the reading assignments with strong interest in Japanese marketing communication, brand strategies, and cultural history.

評価.教科書Required texts0: Reading materials will be available at LUNA at least one week before each class.
